Package progetto.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGameController
    Game controller manages everything related to a single game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractExecutibleGameAction
    Actions extends this abstract class to be registered in the model
    CancelToolCardUseAction
    Action to cancel the use of a tool card
    EndTurnAction
    Action to end turn, it can be called anytime and it ensures that the game will procede to the next turn
    ExecuteToolCard11Action
    Action to execute tool card 11
    ExecuteToolCard12Action
    Action to execute tool card 12
    ExecuteToolCard1Action
    Action to execute tool card 1
    ExecuteToolCard2Or3Action
    Action to execute tool card 2 or 3
    ExecuteToolCard4Action
    Action to execute tool card 4
    ExecuteToolCard5Action
    Action to execute tool card 5
    ExecuteToolCard6Or10Action
    Action to execute tool card 6 or 10
    ExecuteToolCard7Action
    Action to execute tool card 7
    ExecuteToolCard8Action
    Action to execute tool card 8
    ExecuteToolCard9Action
    Action to execute tool card 9
    ExecuteToolCardAction
    Action to execute a tool card
    FrameSetAction
    Action to set window frame at the begin of the game
    GameController
    Game controller manages everything related to a single game.
    PickDiceAction
    Action to pick a dice (from extracted to picked)
    PlaceDiceAction
    Action to place a dice in placed window frame
    SetDifficultyAction
    Action to set difficulty (used in Single Player game)
    SetPlayerCountAction
    Action to set number of players of the game
    SetSeedAction
    Action to set game seed (needed for random - platform independent)
    StartGameAction
    starts the model
    ToolCardSetDiceRoundTrackAction
    Action to select a dice from round track
    ToolCardSetDiceValueAction
    Action to set the value of the dice
    ToolCardSetIncreaseDecreaseAction
    Action to choose whether to increase or decrease the value of the dice
    ToolCardSetPickedDiceAction
    Action to select a picked dice
    ToolCardSetPlacedDiceAction
    Action to select a dice from placed dice frame
    ToolCardSetSecondPlacedDiceAction
    Action to select a dice from placed dice frame
    ToolCardSetSinglePlayerDiceAction
    Action to set the dice to use to activate tool card in single player
    UseToolCardAction
    Action to use tool card
